items.description: IoT sensor evaluation boards (ARM Cortex-M4 x 24)
Cloud compute credits (GCP) for GNN training

items.flag_reason: Office supplies are not consumed or transformed by SR&ED. Ineligible under ITA 37(1)(a)(ii).

items.description: USB cables and adapters for test rigs

items.itc_note: Arms-length contract: 100% deductible, 80% qualifies for ITC

items.flag_reason: Contract does not specify SR&ED work. Project P003 is ineligible. Contract language references 'migration services' not 'experimental development'. Ineligible under ITA 37(1)(a)(i).

overhead.note: Proxy method: 55% of salary base (excluding specified employees for PPA). Not deductible but earns ITC. Specified employee Raj Gupta salary excluded from PPA base per ITA 37(9.1).

deliberate_errors.description: Office supplies ($1,200) claimed as SR&ED materials
deliberate_errors.rule: Materials must be consumed or transformed by SR&ED. Office supplies are neither. CRA Policy: Materials for SR&ED (2024-01-23), Section 3.2.
deliberate_errors.remediation: Remove $1,200 from materials claim. Reduces qualified expenditures.

deliberate_errors.description: TechBridge Ltd. contract ($45,000) on ineligible project P003
deliberate_errors.rule: Project P003 fails all five questions of the eligibility test. No expenditures on this project qualify. CRA Filing Requirements Policy (2025-01-28).
deliberate_errors.remediation: Remove entire P003 from claim. Reduces qualified expenditures by $129,111 (salaries $84,111 + contract $45,000).

deliberate_errors.description: TechBridge contract language does not specify SR&ED
deliberate_errors.rule: Contract must specify that work is SR&ED for expenditure to qualify. CRA Contract Expenditures for SR&ED Policy, Section 4.1.
deliberate_errors.remediation: Even if project were eligible, contract would need amendment to specify SR&ED clause.

deliberate_errors.description: Raj Gupta (15% shareholder) salary not capped for PPA calculation
deliberate_errors.rule: Specified employees (10%+ shareholders) salary capped at lesser of: (a) 75% of salary, or (b) 2.5x YMPE ($171,250 for 2024 YMPE $68,500) for PPA base. Raj salary $118,000 x 75% = $88,500 cap applies for PPA. However, since P003 is ineligible, this is moot.
deliberate_errors.remediation: If P003 were eligible, PPA base for Raj would be $88,500 x (800/1800) = $39,333 not $52,444. Currently moot because P003 should be removed entirely.
